title: TpBD/UiO-66-NH2 micro–mesoporous hybrid material as a stationary phase for open tubular capillary electrochromatography
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28148-28159
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05097E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lidi Gao, Xinran Qu, Shuang Meng, Mo Chen, Yuxin He, Fuquan Zhao, Hongtao Chu, Shili Qin, Fenglong Jin
The excellent stability of covalent organic frameworks (COFs) and the diversity of metal organic frameworks (MOFs) make MOF/COF hybrid materials promising candidates for chromatographic stationary phases.
